summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2570 for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue and Twelfth Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers in said district; under Ordinance No. 29889, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
